name: Channel Divinity (Cleric)
rules: You can use Channel Divinity effects such as Divine Spark or Turn Undead.
When a Channel Divinity effect requires a saving throw, the DC equals your cleric spell save DC.
limits: Uses per class table; regain one use on a short rest and all uses on a long rest.

sourceRef.file: docs/sources/phb2024/04-Character Classes - Player's Handbook - Dungeons & Dragons - Sources - D&D Beyond.pdf

trigger: when you choose to use Channel Divinity
